entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
